      void setActions()
      Sets all functions that are needed for the view.
      private void setAlphaNumBindings()
      Links the baseProperty of all alphanumeric buttons to the attribute baseProperty, to show or hide the buttons automatically if the base is changing.

      Simulates the backspace button an the keyboard.
      private void setButtonActions()
      Sets actions for all buttons
      private void setClearAction()
      Resets value by clicking on clear button and updates all text fields.

      Sets the listener for tfDec, to convert the input and update the other text fields immediately.

      • setInitialState

        private void setInitialState()
        Sets the attributes to the initial condition.
        Since:
        Bitchanger 0.1.7

      • setTextFieldActions

        private void setTextFieldActions()
        Sets listener for the text fields, to convert the input in any numeral system immediately. Furthermore the attribute focusedTF gets updates by selecting another text field and baseProperty gets connected to the base of this text field.
        Since:
        Bitchanger 0.1.7
        See Also:
        setDecValListener(), setIEEEValListener(), setTFSelection(), updateIEEEStandard()

      • setDecValListener

        private void setDecValListener()
        Sets the listener for tfDec, to convert the input and update the other text fields immediately.
        Since:
        Bitchanger 0.1.7

      • setIEEEValListener

        private void setIEEEValListener()
        Sets the listener for tfIEEE, to convert the input and update the other text fields immediately.
        Since:
        Bitchanger 0.1.7

        private void setTFSelection()
        Updates the attribute focusedTF by selecting a text filed with the cursor and connects baseProperty with the baseProperty of the text field.

      • setAlphaNumBindings

        private void setAlphaNumBindings()
        Links the baseProperty of all alphanumeric buttons to the attribute baseProperty, to show or hide the buttons automatically if the base is changing.
        Since:
        Bitchanger 0.1.7

        Resets value by clicking on clear button and updates all text fields.
